column5: Has anyone camped on islands at Lake Minnitaki. I heard it's not legal but can't find any details on it. Have one in our fishing party that wants to kayak out a couple nights of the week and camp overnight. We plan on keeping in contact with him by our marine radios and know what island he will be at. Any thoughts?
Did you check with the MNR? http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business...02_170045.html
